00048 // XXX exporter writes wrong data for shared armatures.  A separate
00049 // controller should be written for each armature-mesh binding how do
00050 // we make controller ids then?
00051 ArmatureExporter::ArmatureExporter(COLLADASW::StreamWriter *sw, const ExportSettings *export_settings) : COLLADASW::LibraryControllers(sw), export_settings(export_settings) {}
00052 
00053 // write bone nodes
00054 void ArmatureExporter::add_armature_bones(Object *ob_arm, Scene* sce,
00055                                           SceneExporter* se,
00056                                           std::list<Object*>& child_objects)
00057 {
00058     // write bone nodes
00059     bArmature *arm = (bArmature*)ob_arm->data;
00060     for (Bone *bone = (Bone*)arm->bonebase.first; bone; bone = bone->next) {
00061         // start from root bones
00062         if (!bone->parent)
00063             add_bone_node(bone, ob_arm, sce, se, child_objects);
00064     }
00065 }
00066 
00067 bool ArmatureExporter::is_skinned_mesh(Object *ob)
00068 {
00069     return get_assigned_armature(ob) != NULL;
00070 }
00071 
00072 void ArmatureExporter::add_instance_controller(Object *ob)
00073 {
00074     Object *ob_arm = get_assigned_armature(ob);
00075     bArmature *arm = (bArmature*)ob_arm->data;
00076 
00077     const std::string& controller_id = get_controller_id(ob_arm, ob);
00078 
00079     COLLADASW::InstanceController ins(mSW);
00080     ins.setUrl(COLLADASW::URI(COLLADABU::Utils::EMPTY_STRING, controller_id));
00081 
00082     // write root bone URLs
00083     Bone *bone;
00084     for (bone = (Bone*)arm->bonebase.first; bone; bone = bone->next) {
00085         if (!bone->parent)
00086             ins.addSkeleton(COLLADABU::URI(COLLADABU::Utils::EMPTY_STRING, get_joint_id(bone, ob_arm)));
00087     }
00088 
00089     InstanceWriter::add_material_bindings(ins.getBindMaterial(), ob);
00090         
00091     ins.add();
00092 }

00094 void ArmatureExporter::export_controllers(Scene *sce)
00095 {
00096     scene = sce;
00097 
00098     openLibrary();
00099 
00100     GeometryFunctor gf;
00101     gf.forEachMeshObjectInScene<ArmatureExporter>(sce, *this, this->export_settings->selected);
00102 
00103     closeLibrary();
00104 }

00106 void ArmatureExporter::operator()(Object *ob)
00107 {
00108     Object *ob_arm = get_assigned_armature(ob);
00109 
00110     if (ob_arm /*&& !already_written(ob_arm)*/)
00111         export_controller(ob, ob_arm);
00112 }

00125 void ArmatureExporter::find_objects_using_armature(Object *ob_arm, std::vector<Object *>& objects, Scene *sce)
00126 {
00127     objects.clear();
00128 
00129     Base *base= (Base*) sce->base.first;
00130     while(base) {
00131         Object *ob = base->object;
00132         
00133         if (ob->type == OB_MESH && get_assigned_armature(ob) == ob_arm) {
00134             objects.push_back(ob);
00135         }
00136 
00137         base= base->next;
00138     }
00139 }
00140 #endif
00141 
00142 Object *ArmatureExporter::get_assigned_armature(Object *ob)
00143 {
00144     Object *ob_arm = NULL;
00145 
00146     if (ob->parent && ob->partype == PARSKEL && ob->parent->type == OB_ARMATURE) {
00147         ob_arm = ob->parent;
00148     }
00149     else {
00150         ModifierData *mod = (ModifierData*)ob->modifiers.first;
00151         while (mod) {
00152             if (mod->type == eModifierType_Armature) {
00153                 ob_arm = ((ArmatureModifierData*)mod)->object;
00154             }
00155 
00156             mod = mod->next;
00157         }
00158     }
00159 
00160     return ob_arm;
00161 }

00163 std::string ArmatureExporter::get_joint_sid(Bone *bone, Object *ob_arm)
00164 {
00165     return get_joint_id(bone, ob_arm);
00166 }

00168 // parent_mat is armature-space
00169 void ArmatureExporter::add_bone_node(Bone *bone, Object *ob_arm, Scene* sce,
00170                                      SceneExporter* se,
00171                                      std::list<Object*>& child_objects)
00172 {
00173     std::string node_id = get_joint_id(bone, ob_arm);
00174     std::string node_name = std::string(bone->name);
00175     std::string node_sid = get_joint_sid(bone, ob_arm);
00176 
00177     COLLADASW::Node node(mSW);
00178 
00179     node.setType(COLLADASW::Node::JOINT);
00180     node.setNodeId(node_id);
00181     node.setNodeName(node_name);
00182     node.setNodeSid(node_sid);
00183 
00184     /*if ( bone->childbase.first == NULL || BLI_countlist(&(bone->childbase))>=2)
00185         add_blender_leaf_bone( bone, ob_arm , node );
00186     else{*/
00187     node.start();
00188 
00189     add_bone_transform(ob_arm, bone, node);
00190 
00191     // Write nodes of childobjects, remove written objects from list
00192     std::list<Object*>::iterator i = child_objects.begin();
00193 
00194     while( i != child_objects.end() )
00195     {
00196         if ((*i)->partype == PARBONE && (0 == strcmp((*i)->parsubstr, bone->name)))
00197         {
00198             float backup_parinv[4][4];
00199             copy_m4_m4(backup_parinv, (*i)->parentinv);
00200 
00201             // crude, temporary change to parentinv
00202             // so transform gets exported correctly.
00203 
00204             // Add bone tail- translation... don't know why
00205             // bone parenting is against the tail of a bone
00206             // and not it's head, seems arbitrary.
00207             (*i)->parentinv[3][1] += bone->length;
00208 
00209             // SECOND_LIFE_COMPATIBILITY
00210             // TODO: when such objects are animated as
00211             // single matrix the tweak must be applied
00212             // to the result.
00213             if (export_settings->second_life)
00214             {
00215                 // tweak objects parentinverse to match compatibility
00216                 float temp[4][4];
00217 
00218                 copy_m4_m4(temp, bone->arm_mat);
00219                 temp[3][0] = temp[3][1] = temp[3][2] = 0.0f;
00220 
00221                 mult_m4_m4m4((*i)->parentinv, temp, (*i)->parentinv);
00222             }
00223 
00224             se->writeNodes(*i, sce);
00225 
00226             copy_m4_m4((*i)->parentinv, backup_parinv);
00227             child_objects.erase(i++);
00228         }
00229         else i++;
00230     }
00231 
00232     for (Bone *child = (Bone*)bone->childbase.first; child; child = child->next) {
00233         add_bone_node(child, ob_arm, sce, se, child_objects);
00234     }
00235     node.end();
00236     //}
00237 }

00239 /*void ArmatureExporter::add_blender_leaf_bone(Bone *bone, Object *ob_arm, COLLADASW::Node& node)
00240 {
00241     node.start();
00242     
00243     add_bone_transform(ob_arm, bone, node);
00244     
00245     node.addExtraTechniqueParameter("blender", "tip_x", bone->tail[0] );
00246     node.addExtraTechniqueParameter("blender", "tip_y", bone->tail[1] );
00247     node.addExtraTechniqueParameter("blender", "tip_z", bone->tail[2] );
00248     
00249     for (Bone *child = (Bone*)bone->childbase.first; child; child = child->next) {
00250         add_bone_node(child, ob_arm, sce, se, child_objects);
00251     }
00252     node.end();
00253     
00254 }*/
00255 void ArmatureExporter::add_bone_transform(Object *ob_arm, Bone *bone, COLLADASW::Node& node)
00256 {
00257     bPoseChannel *pchan = get_pose_channel(ob_arm->pose, bone->name);
00258 
00259     float mat[4][4];
00260 
00261     if (bone->parent) {
00262         // get bone-space matrix from armature-space
00263         bPoseChannel *parchan = get_pose_channel(ob_arm->pose, bone->parent->name);
00264 
00265         float invpar[4][4];
00266         invert_m4_m4(invpar, parchan->pose_mat);
00267         mult_m4_m4m4(mat, invpar, pchan->pose_mat);
00268     }
00269     else {
00270         copy_m4_m4(mat, pchan->pose_mat);
00271         // Why? Joint's localspace is still it's parent node
00272         //get world-space from armature-space
00273         //mult_m4_m4m4(mat, ob_arm->obmat, pchan->pose_mat);
00274     }
00275 
00276     // SECOND_LIFE_COMPATIBILITY
00277     if (export_settings->second_life)
00278     {
00279         // Remove rotations vs armature from transform
00280         // parent_rest_rot * mat * irest_rot
00281         float temp[4][4];
00282         copy_m4_m4(temp, bone->arm_mat);
00283         temp[3][0] = temp[3][1] = temp[3][2] = 0.0f;
00284         invert_m4(temp);
00285 
00286         mult_m4_m4m4(mat, mat, temp);
00287 
00288         if (bone->parent)
00289         {
00290             copy_m4_m4(temp, bone->parent->arm_mat);
00291             temp[3][0] = temp[3][1] = temp[3][2] = 0.0f;
00292 
00293             mult_m4_m4m4(mat, temp, mat);
00294         }
00295     }
00296 
00297     TransformWriter::add_node_transform(node, mat,NULL );
00298 }
00299 
00300 std::string ArmatureExporter::get_controller_id(Object *ob_arm, Object *ob)
00301 {
00302     return translate_id(id_name(ob_arm)) + "_" + translate_id(id_name(ob)) + SKIN_CONTROLLER_ID_SUFFIX;
00303 }
00304 
00305 // ob should be of type OB_MESH
00306 // both args are required
00307 void ArmatureExporter::export_controller(Object* ob, Object *ob_arm)
00308 {
00309     // joint names
00310     // joint inverse bind matrices
00311     // vertex weights
00312 
00313     // input:
00314     // joint names: ob -> vertex group names
00315     // vertex group weights: me->dvert -> groups -> index, weight
00316 
00317     /*
00318     me->dvert:
00319 
00320     typedef struct MDeformVert {
00321         struct MDeformWeight *dw;
00322         int totweight;
00323         int flag;   // flag only in use for weightpaint now
00324     } MDeformVert;
00325 
00326     typedef struct MDeformWeight {
00327         int             def_nr;
00328         float           weight;
00329     } MDeformWeight;
00330     */
00331 
00332     Mesh *me = (Mesh*)ob->data;
00333     if (!me->dvert) return;
00334 
00335     std::string controller_name = id_name(ob_arm);
00336     std::string controller_id = get_controller_id(ob_arm, ob);
00337 
00338     openSkin(controller_id, controller_name,
00339              COLLADABU::URI(COLLADABU::Utils::EMPTY_STRING, get_geometry_id(ob)));
00340 
00341     add_bind_shape_mat(ob);
00342 
00343     std::string joints_source_id = add_joints_source(ob_arm, &ob->defbase, controller_id);
00344     std::string inv_bind_mat_source_id = add_inv_bind_mats_source(ob_arm, &ob->defbase, controller_id);
00345 
00346     std::list<int> vcounts;
00347     std::list<int> joints;
00348     std::list<float> weights;
00349 
00350     {
00351         int i, j;
00352 
00353         // def group index -> joint index
00354         std::vector<int> joint_index_by_def_index;
00355         bDeformGroup *def;
00356 
00357         for (def = (bDeformGroup*)ob->defbase.first, i = 0, j = 0; def; def = def->next, i++) {
00358             if (is_bone_defgroup(ob_arm, def))
00359                 joint_index_by_def_index.push_back(j++);
00360             else
00361                 joint_index_by_def_index.push_back(-1);
00362         }
00363 
00364         for (i = 0; i < me->totvert; i++) {
00365             MDeformVert *vert = &me->dvert[i];
00366             std::map<int, float> jw;
00367 
00368             // We're normalizing the weights later
00369             float sumw = 0.0f;
00370 
00371             for (j = 0; j < vert->totweight; j++) {
00372                 int joint_index = joint_index_by_def_index[vert->dw[j].def_nr];
00373                 if (joint_index != -1 && vert->dw[j].weight > 0.0f)
00374                 {
00375                     jw[joint_index] += vert->dw[j].weight;
00376                     sumw += vert->dw[j].weight;
00377                 }
00378             }
00379 
00380             if (sumw > 0.0f)
00381             {
00382                 float invsumw = 1.0f/sumw;
00383                 vcounts.push_back(jw.size());
00384                 for (std::map<int, float>::iterator m = jw.begin(); m != jw.end(); ++m)
00385                 {
00386                     joints.push_back((*m).first);
00387                     weights.push_back(invsumw*(*m).second);
00388                 }
00389             }
00390             else
00391             {
00392                 vcounts.push_back(0);
00393                 /*vcounts.push_back(1);
00394                 joints.push_back(-1);
00395                 weights.push_back(1.0f);*/
00396             }
00397         }
00398     }
00399 
00400     std::string weights_source_id = add_weights_source(me, controller_id, weights);
00401     add_joints_element(&ob->defbase, joints_source_id, inv_bind_mat_source_id);
00402     add_vertex_weights_element(weights_source_id, joints_source_id, vcounts, joints);
00403 
00404     closeSkin();
00405     closeController();
00406 }
00407 
00408 void ArmatureExporter::add_joints_element(ListBase *defbase,
00409                         const std::string& joints_source_id, const std::string& inv_bind_mat_source_id)
00410 {
00411     COLLADASW::JointsElement joints(mSW);
00412     COLLADASW::InputList &input = joints.getInputList();
00413 
00414     input.push_back(COLLADASW::Input(COLLADASW::InputSemantic::JOINT, // constant declared in COLLADASWInputList.h
00415                                COLLADASW::URI(COLLADABU::Utils::EMPTY_STRING, joints_source_id)));
00416     input.push_back(COLLADASW::Input(COLLADASW::InputSemantic::BINDMATRIX,
00417                                COLLADASW::URI(COLLADABU::Utils::EMPTY_STRING, inv_bind_mat_source_id)));
00418     joints.add();
00419 }
00420 
00421 void ArmatureExporter::add_bind_shape_mat(Object *ob)
00422 {
00423     double bind_mat[4][4];
00424 
00425     converter.mat4_to_dae_double(bind_mat, ob->obmat);
00426 
00427     addBindShapeTransform(bind_mat);
00428 }
00429 
00430 std::string ArmatureExporter::add_joints_source(Object *ob_arm, ListBase *defbase, const std::string& controller_id)
00431 {
00432     std::string source_id = controller_id + JOINTS_SOURCE_ID_SUFFIX;
00433 
00434     int totjoint = 0;
00435     bDeformGroup *def;
00436     for (def = (bDeformGroup*)defbase->first; def; def = def->next) {
00437         if (is_bone_defgroup(ob_arm, def))
00438             totjoint++;
00439     }
00440 
00441     COLLADASW::NameSource source(mSW);
00442     source.setId(source_id);
00443     source.setArrayId(source_id + ARRAY_ID_SUFFIX);
00444     source.setAccessorCount(totjoint);
00445     source.setAccessorStride(1);
00446     
00447     COLLADASW::SourceBase::ParameterNameList &param = source.getParameterNameList();
00448     param.push_back("JOINT");
00449 
00450     source.prepareToAppendValues();
00451 
00452     for (def = (bDeformGroup*)defbase->first; def; def = def->next) {
00453         Bone *bone = get_bone_from_defgroup(ob_arm, def);
00454         if (bone)
00455             source.appendValues(get_joint_sid(bone, ob_arm));
00456     }
00457 
00458     source.finish();
00459 
00460     return source_id;
00461 }
00462 
00463 std::string ArmatureExporter::add_inv_bind_mats_source(Object *ob_arm, ListBase *defbase, const std::string& controller_id)
00464 {
00465     std::string source_id = controller_id + BIND_POSES_SOURCE_ID_SUFFIX;
00466 
00467     int totjoint = 0;
00468     for (bDeformGroup *def = (bDeformGroup*)defbase->first; def; def = def->next) {
00469         if (is_bone_defgroup(ob_arm, def))
00470             totjoint++;
00471     }
00472 
00473     COLLADASW::FloatSourceF source(mSW);
00474     source.setId(source_id);
00475     source.setArrayId(source_id + ARRAY_ID_SUFFIX);
00476     source.setAccessorCount(totjoint); //BLI_countlist(defbase));
00477     source.setAccessorStride(16);
00478     
00479     source.setParameterTypeName(&COLLADASW::CSWC::CSW_VALUE_TYPE_FLOAT4x4);
00480     COLLADASW::SourceBase::ParameterNameList &param = source.getParameterNameList();
00481     param.push_back("TRANSFORM");
00482 
00483     source.prepareToAppendValues();
00484 
00485     bPose *pose = ob_arm->pose;
00486     bArmature *arm = (bArmature*)ob_arm->data;
00487 
00488     int flag = arm->flag;
00489 
00490     // put armature in rest position
00491     if (!(arm->flag & ARM_RESTPOS)) {
00492         arm->flag |= ARM_RESTPOS;
00493         where_is_pose(scene, ob_arm);
00494     }
00495 
00496     for (bDeformGroup *def = (bDeformGroup*)defbase->first; def; def = def->next) {
00497         if (is_bone_defgroup(ob_arm, def)) {
00498             bPoseChannel *pchan = get_pose_channel(pose, def->name);
00499 
00500             float mat[4][4];
00501             float world[4][4];
00502             float inv_bind_mat[4][4];
00503 
00504             // SECOND_LIFE_COMPATIBILITY
00505             if (export_settings->second_life)
00506             {
00507                 // Only translations, no rotation vs armature
00508                 float temp[4][4];
00509                 unit_m4(temp);
00510                 copy_v3_v3(temp[3], pchan->bone->arm_mat[3]);
00511                 mult_m4_m4m4(world, ob_arm->obmat, temp);
00512             }
00513             else
00514             {
00515                 // make world-space matrix, arm_mat is armature-space
00516                 mult_m4_m4m4(world, ob_arm->obmat, pchan->bone->arm_mat);
00517             }
00518 
00519             invert_m4_m4(mat, world);
00520             converter.mat4_to_dae(inv_bind_mat, mat);
00521 
00522             source.appendValues(inv_bind_mat);
00523         }
00524     }
00525 
00526     // back from rest positon
00527     if (!(flag & ARM_RESTPOS)) {
00528         arm->flag = flag;
00529         where_is_pose(scene, ob_arm);
00530     }
00531 
00532     source.finish();
00533 
00534     return source_id;
00535 }
00536 
00537 Bone *ArmatureExporter::get_bone_from_defgroup(Object *ob_arm, bDeformGroup* def)
00538 {
00539     bPoseChannel *pchan = get_pose_channel(ob_arm->pose, def->name);
00540     return pchan ? pchan->bone : NULL;
00541 }
00542 
00543 bool ArmatureExporter::is_bone_defgroup(Object *ob_arm, bDeformGroup* def)
00544 {
00545     return get_bone_from_defgroup(ob_arm, def) != NULL;
00546 }
00547 
00548 std::string ArmatureExporter::add_weights_source(Mesh *me, const std::string& controller_id, const std::list<float>& weights)
00549 {
00550     std::string source_id = controller_id + WEIGHTS_SOURCE_ID_SUFFIX;
00551 
00552     COLLADASW::FloatSourceF source(mSW);
00553     source.setId(source_id);
00554     source.setArrayId(source_id + ARRAY_ID_SUFFIX);
00555     source.setAccessorCount(weights.size());
00556     source.setAccessorStride(1);
00557     
00558     COLLADASW::SourceBase::ParameterNameList &param = source.getParameterNameList();
00559     param.push_back("WEIGHT");
00560 
00561     source.prepareToAppendValues();
00562 
00563     for (std::list<float>::const_iterator i = weights.begin(); i != weights.end(); ++i) {
00564         source.appendValues(*i);
00565     }
00566 
00567     source.finish();
00568 
00569     return source_id;
00570 }
00571 
00572 void ArmatureExporter::add_vertex_weights_element(const std::string& weights_source_id, const std::string& joints_source_id,
00573                                                   const std::list<int>& vcounts,
00574                                                   const std::list<int>& joints)
00575 {
00576     COLLADASW::VertexWeightsElement weightselem(mSW);
00577     COLLADASW::InputList &input = weightselem.getInputList();
00578 
00579     int offset = 0;
00580     input.push_back(COLLADASW::Input(COLLADASW::InputSemantic::JOINT, // constant declared in COLLADASWInputList.h
00581                                      COLLADASW::URI(COLLADABU::Utils::EMPTY_STRING, joints_source_id), offset++));
00582     input.push_back(COLLADASW::Input(COLLADASW::InputSemantic::WEIGHT,
00583                                      COLLADASW::URI(COLLADABU::Utils::EMPTY_STRING, weights_source_id), offset++));
00584 
00585     weightselem.setCount(vcounts.size());
00586 
00587     // write number of deformers per vertex
00588     COLLADASW::PrimitivesBase::VCountList vcountlist;
00589 
00590     vcountlist.resize(vcounts.size());
00591     std::copy(vcounts.begin(), vcounts.end(), vcountlist.begin());
00592 
00593     weightselem.prepareToAppendVCountValues();
00594     weightselem.appendVertexCount(vcountlist);
00595 
00596     weightselem.CloseVCountAndOpenVElement();
00597 
00598     // write deformer index - weight index pairs
00599     int weight_index = 0;
00600     for (std::list<int>::const_iterator i = joints.begin(); i != joints.end(); ++i)
00601     {
00602         weightselem.appendValues(*i, weight_index++);
00603     }
00604 
00605     weightselem.finish();
00606 }
